title: The Prince Is Dead, So Let’s Start Over Everything Again! - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Age Regression   Child Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Sickly Characters   Transmigration
author: 히니
description:
I possessed a villainess in a Novel. For some reason, however, I keep returning to when I was eight years old every sixteen years. This life is the fourth.

Come to think of it, I think I also return when the second male lead dies. But why did he die? The original hasn’t even started yet?!

Don’t tell me, is it because I don’t live like the original?

So I started to live according to the original.

…But what was the problem?

“How did you get so big? When you were young, you were so small and cute.”

“Because you raised me like this.”

“Did I?”

When did I? I only remember bothering him like a villain though?

I looked up at him with a questioning look.

Then he lifted his finger and pointed it at my head.

“You read a book to me.”

And then he pointed at my lips.

“It made me realize the magic.”

And then my hands.

“I practiced sword.”

Lastly, at the heart.

“You taught me what I don’t know.”

He, who was speaking in a low voice, grabbed my hand and stroked my head.

“You’re the one who made me do this, and you shouldn’t say that anymore. No matter how big I am, you should keep loving me.”>
